items.name: comedy
items.description: Movies designed to make you laugh, filled with humorous situations and witty dialogue.

items.name: action
items.description: High-energy movies with thrilling sequences, intense fights, and daring stunts.

items.name: drama
items.description: Emotionally charged narratives that explore complex human experiences and relationships.

items.name: horror
items.description: Spine-chilling movies that aim to frighten and thrill audiences with suspense and terror.

items.name: romance
items.description: Heartwarming stories that focus on love and relationships between characters.

items.name: thriller
items.description: Movies filled with suspense, unexpected twists, and psychological tension.

items.name: sci-fi
items.description: Futuristic movies featuring advanced technology, space exploration, and otherworldly phenomena.

items.name: fantasy
items.description: Imaginative movies with magical elements, mythical creatures, and fantastical worlds.

items.name: animation
items.description: Movies brought to life through artistic animation, appealing to all age groups.

items.name: mystery
items.description: Intriguing movies centered around solving puzzles, crimes, or uncovering secrets.

items.name: adventure
items.description: Exciting movies featuring epic journeys, exploration, and daring escapades.

items.name: documentary
items.description: Informative movies that explore real-world topics and events with factual storytelling.

items.name: biography
items.description: Movies based on the lives of notable individuals and their impactful stories.

items.name: musical
items.description: Entertaining movies that combine storytelling with songs and dance performances.

items.name: crime
items.description: Movies centered around illegal activities, law enforcement, and moral dilemmas.

items.name: western
items.description: Classic movies set in the Old West, featuring cowboys, outlaws, and frontier life.
